text: Hoke Hospital is offering #COVID19 vaccines to healthcare workers and those 75 and older on a walk-in basis. Vaccine clinic hours are Tues–Fri, 10am-2pm.  For more information on Cape Fear Valley COVID vaccine clinics, please visit: https://t.co/oRD7CF8OQ5. #vaccine #clinic #free https://t.co/RlPZUK5hJ7
